text: The Ceralvo Masonic Hall and School, in Centertown, Kentucky, was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2015. It was one of 15 sites approved by the Kentucky Historic Preservation Review Board for NRHP nomination in June 2015. ==References== Category:National Register of Historic Places in Kentucky Category:Former Masonic buildings in Kentucky Category:Ohio County, Kentucky
title: Ceralvo Masonic Hall and School
